availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Robert Holloway and Catharine Holloway. Married to Helen M. Boyd Holloway in Lyon County, Kentucky, on May 15, 1863. Father of Evamy Holloway and Roseylee Holloway. Resident in Caldwell County in 1850. Resident in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 378B-379A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 702.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 20B.
"Crittenden Holloway (unknown-1891)," Find A Grave, Memorial #136044765, accessed November 17, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/136044765.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film #000321364, p. 39 of 303 on microfilm.
